shopValue.title: Shop Value
shopValue.description: This page displays cost-effectiveness analysis of various items in the shop to help players make better purchasing decisions.

packageValue.title: Package Value
packageValue.description: This page displays cost-effectiveness analysis of various packages in the game to help players evaluate package purchase value.

itemValueTable.title: Item Value Table
itemValueTable.description: This page displays a value assessment table for various items in the game to help players understand the relative value of items.

test.title: Vuetify Component Test
test.description: This page showcases various Vuetify components used within the project.
